results.deck: A canceled, norse-inspired fantasy RPG from Paradox Interactive, creators of the Crusader Kings and Europa Universalis franchises.
results.name: Runemaster

results.deck: A randomly generated sandbox action RPG where the player constructs their own airship and sets out on adventure.
results.name: Airship Q

results.deck: Frantic high-speed aerial-combat action game played in 1st or 3rd person.
results.name: Strike Vector

results.deck: Radio-controlled car racing game exclusively for the PlayStation 4.
results.name: Ready to Run

results.deck: WWE 2K15 is the first game in the franchise to appear on the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: WWE 2K15

results.deck: Basketball returns in NBA 2K15.
results.name: NBA 2K15

results.deck: The Assassin's Creed IV DLC, starring Adéwalé, is released as a standalone, digital release for PS4, PS3, and PC.
results.name: Assassin's Creed: Freedom Cry

results.deck: The eleventh installment of the Call of Duty franchise (and the first spearheaded by Sledgehammer Games) brings modern military thirty years into the future, as new technology (including powered exoskeleton frames and cloaking devices) makes a certain Private Military Corporation the dominant military force of the world.
results.name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare

results.deck: Necrosoft is working on a followup to Gunhouse called Gunsport.
results.name: Gunsport

results.deck: The latest entry of the Worms franchise comes to the PS4 and Xbox One in 2014.
results.name: Worms Battlegrounds

results.deck: A space-based, first-person puzzle game revolving around an astronaut trying to repair a heavily damaged space station orbiting the Earth.
results.name: Adr1ft

results.deck: In this parody of inaccurate and terribly made "Simulator" games, an indestructible goat wreaks havoc on a vaguely European sandbox world plagued by buggy physics and non-sequiturs.
results.name: Goat Simulator

results.deck: Two to eight players punch, kick, and throw each other to be the last one standing in this physics-based brawler.
results.name: Gang Beasts

results.deck: A stealth and infiltration game, with elements of RPG. The game is a spin-off from Cyanide Studio's Of Orcs and Men featuring the goblin protagonist Styx.
results.name: Styx: Master of Shadows

results.deck: A new Transformers game headed to multiple platforms across home consoles and PC.
results.name: Transformers: Rise of the Dark Spark

results.deck: The power of Nikoli's sudoku and the power of the PlayStation 4 collide in this Japanese launch release.
results.name: Nikoli no Puzzle 4: Sudoku

results.deck: Tottemo E Mahjong Plus is a download-only launch title for Japanese PS4s.
results.name: Tottemo E Mahjong Plus

results.deck: A 2D fighting game based on Sega's Shining Force games.
results.name: Blade Arcus from Shining

results.deck: Enhanced version of MixedBag's fast paced 3D shoot 'em up homage to the Commodore 64 classic Uridium.
results.name: Futuridium EP Deluxe

results.deck: A multiplayer puzzle game.
results.name: Tumblestone

results.deck: Ascendant is an unforgiving 2.5D side-scrolling beat 'em up with roguelike elements.
results.name: Ascendant

results.deck: A new entry in the Aqua Moto series featuring jetski races with career & championship modes, online play, 5-person local multiplayer and leaderboards.
results.name: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia

results.deck: The Chainsaw Incident is a high-definition 2D horror/comedy fighting game.
results.name: The Chainsaw Incident

results.deck: A new freestyle scooter game for the new console trio developed by Renegade Kid in partnership with Razor licensee Scarab Entertainment. The game was supposedly canceled due to publisher issues.
results.name: Razor Global Domination Pro Tour

results.deck: A HD reimagining of the 2001 cartoon car combat game for Xbox, Gamecube and PS2.
results.name: Cel Damage HD

results.deck: Scifi metroidvania game about an exploration probe stranded on an alien planet.
results.name: Forma.8

results.deck: A futuristic watercraft racer.
results.name: Riptide GP2

results.deck: An overhead shooter awfully reminiscent of the old "Strike" games.
results.name: Project Root

results.deck: Arkham Knight, developer Rocksteady's return to the Batman series, takes place one year after Arkham City. It promises to expand the open world from the previous game, allowing players to drive the Batmobile through Gotham City's streets.
results.name: Batman: Arkham Knight

results.deck: Shadow Blade is a fast-paced ninja game.
results.name: Shadow Blade

results.deck: From the developers of Zeno Clash, Abyss Odyssey is a 2D platformer adventure game with the mechanical depth of a fighting game and the world randomization of a roguelike.
results.name: Abyss Odyssey

results.deck: An upgraded compilation release of PixelJunk Shooter and its sequel developed by Double Eleven for the PS4 and Vita.
results.name: PixelJunk Shooter Ultimate

results.deck: Tabletop arcade style racing game similar to Micro Machines.
results.name: Super Toy Cars

results.deck: A beat 'em up sequel to 1994's Shaquille O'Neal-based fighting game Shaq Fu.
results.name: Shaq Fu: A Legend Reborn

results.deck: A pinball game developed by Phantom Compass that features light RPG and Puzzle elements.
results.name: Rollers of the Realm

results.deck: A full remake of Assault Suit Leynos, a game originally released in the United States for the Genesis under the name Target Earth, developed by Dracue for the PlayStation 4.
results.name: Assault Suit Leynos

results.deck: A sequel to the XBLIG shooter.
results.name: Revolver360 Re:Actor

results.deck: Monochromatic puzzle game with a protagonist who's terrified of light.
results.name: One Upon Light

results.deck: The 2014 edition of the official MotoGP World Championship video game.
results.name: MotoGP 14

results.deck: A turn-based RPG that takes place during Halloween.
results.name: Costume Quest 2

results.deck: The world's first turn-based real-time puzzle game developed by Funktronic Labs.
results.name: Nova-111

results.deck: Mobile games Tiny Troopers 1 & 2 combined and reworked into console twinstick shooters.
results.name: Tiny Troopers: Joint Ops

results.deck: A new romance game from the developer of the choose-your-own adventure Home.
results.name: Alone With You

results.deck: A survival-strategy game set in the shadow of a devastating war, This War of Mine examines the impact of war on the civilians, not the soldiers.
results.name: This War of Mine

results.deck: Firewatch is a first-person mystery set in the Wyoming wilderness developed by Campo Santo, where the protagonist's only lifeline, emotionally and physically speaking, is the person on the other end of a handheld radio.
results.name: Firewatch

results.deck: A stealth game where the office worker Gary must sneak through the 22 floors between him and his office and get in there before someone realizes that he's late.
results.name: Level 22

results.deck: Arrowhead Games, the studio behind Magicka, developed Gauntlet: Slayer Edition as part of the long-running Gauntlet franchise.
results.name: Gauntlet

results.deck: An indie 2D pixel art-styled pirate-themed, roguelike, randomly generated open world game.
results.name: Pixel Piracy

results.deck: Chariot is a co-op platformer for Xbox One, Playstation 4, PC, and the Nintendo Wii U, starring a Princess and her Fiancé on a mission to transport their deceased King's coffin to its final resting place.
results.name: Chariot

results.deck: Hover: Revolt of Gamers is a first and third person open world parkour roller-skating game inspired by the likes of Jet Set Radio, Mirror's Edge, and the Tony Hawk series.
results.name: Hover: Revolt of Gamers

results.deck: The Assassin's Creed series heads to Paris, France, amid the French Revolution. The player controls Arno Dorian, an Assassin, as he attempts to disrupt and destroy the true powers behind the Revolution.
results.name: Assassin's Creed Unity

results.deck: Frantic multi-player 2D deathmatch with ducks, weapons, and hats.
results.name: Duck Game

results.deck: A cricket game for PC, Xbox 360, PS3, Xbox One and PS4, bearing the name of the late, legendary Australian batsman Don Bradman.
results.name: Don Bradman Cricket 14

results.deck: A procedural generated roguelike dungeon crawler with a classic look.
results.name: Quest of Dungeons

results.deck: A 2D, side-scrolling shooter from the makers of OlliOlli.
results.name: Not a Hero

results.deck: The Hero Trap is a lightning fast roguelike dungeon brawler in the spirit of Gauntlet. Play three heroes simultaneously or team up with friends for local coop play.
results.name: The Hero Trap

results.deck: Return life to a dying world as a bioluminescent butterfly in this metroidvania-style game from Fenix Fire.
results.name: Source

results.deck: Explore an abandoned mansion, spin webs, and capture rare insects as a tiny spider.
results.name: Spider: Rite of the Shrouded Moon

results.deck: Woah Dave! is a frantic, old-school, score-chasing arcade game set to an insane difficulty.
results.name: Woah Dave!

results.deck: Manifold Garden (formerly known as Relativity) is an exploration game in an Escher-esque world.
results.name: Manifold Garden

results.deck: Sentris is a color-based puzzle game that also functions as a music creation tool.
results.name: Sentris

results.deck: Tetropolis is a puzzle platformer that combines elements of Tetris and Metroid.
results.name: Refactor

results.deck: We Are Doomed is a frantic shoot-em-up in a vibrant world of neon colors.
results.name: We Are Doomed

results.deck: An expanded version of the original Toukiden, which continues the story and adds new demons, weapons and other features.
results.name: Toukiden Kiwami

results.deck: A pole-vaulting polo game, part of the Sportsfriends collection.
results.name: Super Pole Riders

results.deck: Trivia quiz game with support for up to 4 players.
results.name: That Trivia Game

results.deck: An upcoming free-to-play competitive multiplayer game in the Orcs Must Die! franchise. The game plays similar to the previous games but with MOBA-like elements. It is currently in closed beta.
results.name: Orcs Must Die! Unchained

results.deck: Disney Interactive is set to include Marvel characters in the next version of its Disney Infinity series.
results.name: Disney Infinity: Marvel Super Heroes

results.deck: A 2D stealth platformer where the player must help the agile little slugcat survive on a harsh, desolated world.
results.name: Rain World

results.deck: Square Enix translates the successful third-person action-adventure series into a stylish turn-based puzzle game that stays true to the franchise's murderous roots.
results.name: Hitman Go

results.deck: A NES-style 2D fantasy brawler from Tribute Games.
results.name: Curses 'N Chaos

results.deck: A sprite-based Metroidvania/RPG from a small team of Mexican and American developers, funded via Kickstarter.
results.name: Heart Forth, Alicia

results.deck: Paperbound is a 4-player arena fighting game that takes place within famous books.
results.name: Paperbound

results.deck: An indie action game featuring rockets.
results.name: RocketsRocketsRockets

results.deck: Trap the series' villains in physical traps and hold those traps up to your ear to hear the villains struggle in the latest Skylanders release.
results.name: Skylanders Trap Team

results.deck: A third person action adventure game with an Ico-esque friendship mechanic between the titular girl and robot.
results.name: The Girl and the Robot

results.deck: A sci-fi themed first-person action runner. Supports up to 32-person multiplayer and the Oculus Rift.
results.name: Infinity Runner

results.deck: A surreal third-person action-adventure by Munich-based indie developer Mimimi Productions.
results.name: The Last Tinker: City of Colors

results.deck: The 26th annual Madden NFL football game.
results.name: Madden NFL 15

results.deck: A puzzle game similar to Lemmings from the creators of Worms.
results.name: Flockers

results.deck: Drifter is an open-world sandbox space trading game with a procedurally-generated galaxy 100,000 light years across made up of tens of thousands of star systems to explore and features an original soundtrack by composer Danny Baranowsky.
results.name: Drifter

results.deck: An indie hack and slash from Japan.
results.name: Croixleur Sigma

results.deck: The sequel to Stealth Bastard/Stealth Inc., A Game of Clones features a more open world map and a greater emphasis on exploration.
results.name: Stealth Inc. 2: A Game of Clones

results.deck: Fenix Rage is a masocore platformer from Green Lava Studios.
results.name: Fenix Rage

results.deck: Pixel Noir combines classic RPG gameplay with a noir detective story. The game is currently in limbo after failing to meet its Kickstarter goal.
results.name: Pixel Noir

results.deck: Indie platformer about a boy who seeks to leave his old life behind using a magical flying door.
results.name: To Leave

results.deck: The 23rd installment in the EA Sports NHL franchise with the promise of a commentary changeover for the first time in eight years, along with revamped physics for both the players and the puck.
results.name: NHL 15

results.deck: An adventure game featuring Sherlock Holmes.
results.name: Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments

results.deck: The second game in Compile Heart's Galapagos RPG series, and the first exclusive JRPG to be released on the PlayStation 4.
results.name: Omega Quintet

results.deck: Never Alone (or Kisima Ingitchuna) is a platform puzzle game based on the folklore of the Iñupiaq people of Alaska.
results.name: Never Alone

results.deck: The sequel to the Zuma-like puzzle game.
results.name: Sparkle 2

results.deck: Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition brings both Diablo III and its expansion, Reaper of Souls, to consoles (including the series' debut on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One) in one package with several new, exclusive features.
results.name: Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition

results.deck: A top down action-RPG from Interceptor Entertainment.
results.name: Bombshell

results.deck: Far Cry 4 puts the player in the role of Ajay Ghale and pits him against a deadly antagonist and an even deadlier environment. Caught in the middle of a brutal Civil War while fulfilling his mother's dying wish, Ghale must fight back against the oppression of Kyrat's leader, Pagan Min, while also battling the ruthlessness of the jungle.
results.name: Far Cry 4

results.deck: A minimalist first-person shooter where the player controls a small cube that becomes harder to see the less health it has.
results.name: VizionEck

results.deck: Visual novel about a teenager who joins the the girl dominated school volunteer Christmas club to make up for causing trouble at an earlier event.
results.name: Kiss Bell

results.deck: A fighting game for PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, and PC set in the Dragon Ball Z universe.
results.name: Dragon Ball XenoVerse

results.deck: The fourth game in the match-3 puzzle The Treasures of Montezuma series.
results.name: The Treasures of Montezuma 4

results.deck: EA's annual soccer release is back for the year 2014.
results.name: FIFA 15

results.deck: Join Mina and other contestants as they slay fantasy beasts in a 2D brawler to enter Iron Chef-like cooking contests.
results.name: Battle Chef Brigade
